Kiersnowo  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kiwity, within Lidzbark County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  north of Kiwity,  east of Lidzbark Warmi≈Ñski, and  north of the regional capital Olsztyn.
